name: .OR2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .OR2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file created with Lotus Organizer 2, an early personal information manager (PIM) program; may include a calendar of events, personal notes, a task list, and other information.

content: Lotus Organizer 2 was included as part of IBM Lotus SmartSuite.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
